casebody.data:
EZELL, et al.
v.
HOSPITAL, et al. No. 44A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 30, 2006. Belinda A. Smith, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDHHS. William H. Elam, Michael J. Rousseaux, Charlotte, for Pammy Ezell. Elizabeth E. McConnell, Asheville, for Grace Hospital, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of March 2006 by NCATL for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(1). By order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of March 2006."
